Section 3: Scope of Work 
The selected vendor will be responsible for the complete execution of the project, including but 
not limited to: 
●​ Conducting site surveys and submitting the installation layout plan by August 2, 2025.

Section 5: General Conditions 
●​ All deliverables must be documented and signed off by the project supervisor.
Any changes to the scope must be approved in writing before execution.

Section 4: Technical Requirements 
The PV modules used must meet BIS certification standards and offer at least 20% efficiency.
All equipment shall carry a minimum warranty of five years from the date of commissioning.
Preventive maintenance shall be provided quarterly during the first year.
